name: Phase 86
description:
Phase 86, our final Bachelor project, was completed in March 2022. The currently available build is a polished version of our vertical slice.

Description:

Phase 86 is a single-player,  futuristic, skill-based, action, first-person shooter in which walls become a playground for our mysterious but deadly Main Character.  To get through our fast-paced levels, players will have to use an aggressive playstyle and take full advantage of our phasing mechanic

Game Development Team:

Patrick VAN DEN BOSCH - Project Manager, Programmer

Axel DUBOIS- Art Manager, VFX Artist

Florent LEDOUX- Level Designer

Adrien MILLOT - Game Designer, Level Designer

Nafi SANOU- Game Designer, Branding

Art Team:

Gaelle  GLEIZES - Art Direction, Character Concept Artist

Anthony NIVEL - Environment Concept Artist

Carine ESPEJO - 3D Artist (Rigging)

 Vincent PAUL - 3D Artist (Character Modelling)

 Kevin IV- Graphic Designer, UI Artist

SUPRAQUENCER- Music Designer
